name: Lilith (itch)
description: Lilith is an interactive drama graphic adventure fantasy game. Narrative driven, it is mostly click-through, like a visual novel, but with click and drag mechanics for optional choices and story elements. It tells the story of Alice, a young apprentice witch who desperately searches for a way to free Lilith, another apprentice, after she is petrified and trapped in stone. You are faced with tough choices, and must ask if is it all worthwhile saving her.
